frontmatter.title: Creating My Website Using Gatsby: Part 2 - Comments
frontmatter.description: I explore the process of how I built my personal website. I show each step in detail, covering the design process, pitfalls, tools, code, and techniques used to build the website. The second post covers how I enabled comments using Utterances with Gatsby.
